executionSettingsId.title: execution settings id

applicationClass.title: application class
applicationClass.description: class from the application jar that is to be executed in the spark submit

applicationJar.title: application jar
applicationJar.description: application jar for the spark submit command

sparkParameters.title: spark submit parameters

confParameters.title: spark conf parameters
confParameters.description: spark conf parameters (--conf) and optional values to use when executing this spark job

applicationParameters.title: application parameters
applicationParameters.description: application specific parameters and optional values to use when executing this spark job

instances.title: execution instances
instances.description: execution instances for this execution object

executionSettings.title: execution type details

executionInstances.title: execution instance list
